sentences.sContent: A plethora of new operators will be allowed to enter the market.
sentences.sCn: 过多的新经营者将获准进入市场。

remMethod.val: ple(看作plen， 满) + thora(看作theater， 剧场) → 剧场太满了， 人过多 → 过多

trans.tranCn: 过剩， 过多； 多血症
trans.tranOther: A plethora of something is a large amount of it, especially an amount of it that is greater than you need, want, or can cope with
